column1: #Text=Tenzin says : " How is the security sweep going ? "
#Text=Tenzin says : " They 've checked underneath the stands ? "
#Text=Tenzin says : " And you have enough officers to cover all points of entry ? "
#Text=Lin says : " I have the skies , the bay , and every nook and cranny of this place covered .
#Text=" Lin says : " Okay , I 'll try to be less abrasive than usual .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " I would appreciate that .
